original_text: Take this book of the law, and put it in the side of the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, that it may be there for a witness against thee.
korean_text: 이 율법책을 가져다가 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤 곁에 두어 너희에게 증거가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: Take this book of the law
and put it in the side of the ark
of the covenant of the Lord your God
that it may be there for a witness
